instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: macbook pro A 1398
threads.message: Hi...I'm from indonesia .. and i want to ask macbook pro retina <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> that magsave green than orange light on. but the logic board still dead. please give me the tutorial to check one by one .  thank u very much

threads.title: macbook pro A 1398
threads.message:
subscribe and watch all his videos [url]https://www.youtube.com/user/rossmanngroup[/url]

check whats the voltage on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> and check the board for corrosion.

threads.title: macbook pro A 1398
threads.message: Are you using a REAL 85W charger?? No Chinese fake garbage, these machines will not power on from a 60W or some Chinese garbage chargers.
